title: 구상만
content:
구상만은 서울
공과대학
화학공학과
교수이자
하이브리드 나노입자 연구실
장을 겸하고 있다.
연락처: 02-2220-0527 / sangman@hanyang.ac.kr
홈페이지:
http://hnp.hanyang.ac.kr/xe/
학력
1978-1982, Seoul National Univ. Chemistry B.S.
1982-1984, Seoul National Univ. Physical Chemistry M.S.
1985-1990, Univ. of Michigan Inorganic Chemistry Ph.D. Synthesis, Characterization and Reactivity of Early Transition Metal Studies
경력
2003.03 ~ Professor, Hanyang University
1998.03 ~ 2003.02 Associate Professor, Hanyang University
1994.03 ~ 1998.02 Assistant Professor, Hanyang University
1992.03 ~ 1994.02 Instructor, Hanyang University
연구관심분야
Preparation and Modification of Metal and Metal Oxide Particles
Preparation of Metal and Metal Oxide 1D/2D Nanostructures
Preparation and Modification of Silicone Materials
